name: Dark Space Robot
description:
DESCRIPTION

Dark Space Robot is an action/adventure platformer game that is combined with mountain, valleys, and dark environment. This game tells the story of a space robot named bot who is thrown out to space because an earthquake. Bot must find a way to come back home by get through different land countour platform. Can bot get through the obstacle and go home?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

STORY

In the planet of bumi, a space robot called bot caught up alone peacefully in his home, suddenly an earthquake throw him out to the dark scary space. As time goes by, surprisingly the space brought him to the nearest land in bumi planet. As soon as bot touch the ground, he immediately tried to reach his house, but the light in bumi planet become more darker. So bot turn on his torch eye to guide his way to finding home. But, the range of his torch eye light is limited so he must be careful to get through bumi planet land countour which just changed because of the earthquake. Can you help bot find his way home?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTRUCTION

  • Press the Right Arrow Button ( → ) or Left Arrow Button ( ← ) to move bot horizontally
  • Press the Up Arrow Button ( ↑ ) or Down Arrow Button ( ↓ ) to move bot vertically
  • Press the Up Arrow Button ( ↑ ) twice to activate double jump

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DIVERSIFIER

1. Dark : 

Implementation of lighting effects, for some parts of the game darker than others

2. Climbing Mountain Through Valley :

Implementation of valleys and mountains in the game

3. Didn't I say to make my life average in my next life?! :

Parameters or player character life will be halved when respawn
